entry.title: GR是否支持按金融交易类型出具直接法合并现金流量表？
entry.content: 您好， 想请问下，单体公司我们是通过金融交易类型出具的直接法的现金流量表，不知道GR是否也支持象单体公司那样按金融交易类型来汇兑出具直接法的现金流量表？ 谢谢

entry.title: How to approve/reject tasks directly in SAP Mobile Start app (s/4hana cloud public edition)
entry.content:
Hello,

We have integrated SAP S/4HANA Cloud with SAP Mobile Start through SAP Build Work Zone.
The purchaser and purchasing manager roles have been exposed to BTP and assigned in Build Work Zone.

After completing all notification-related configurations, we are able to receive purchase requisition approval tasks both on the mobile device and on the Build Work Zone home page.

However, to actually approve or reject a task, we still need to navigate to the tenant and process it there.

Is there a way to handle these approval/rejection actions directly from the SAP Mobile Start app without navigating to the tenant?

Thanks in advance for your guidance.

entry.title: in S/4hana cloud public logistic context, add custom field to batch
entry.content:
Hello,

I seems from the documentation that it is not possible. but I wanted to confirme here.

In a logistics context with a MES we would need to add a custom field on the Batch object and expose in an API.
for now we would use the scenarion SAP_COM_0337 but we might create a custom one if needed.
is it possible with key user extension to add a custom field to a batch?
do we need to go with java SDK abap?
or is it just not possible?

thanks for you help

regards

entry.title: S/4HANA Cloud Communication Management Translations
entry.content:
Hi folks,

I created several technical objects within the public cloud and need to translate them. 

  • Communication scenario
  • Inbound service
  • outbound service

Some Fiori apps e.g. Display communication Scenario can not show entries when translations of those objects are missing.

Already tried to use the app "Manage Translations" but it does not allow adding the above objects,

Any ideas?

Thanks.

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud 2508 / Error when using the new App "Import Master Data - Business Partners"
entry.content:
Hello Experts,
i wanted to utilize the new Apps "Export Master Data - Business Partners (New)" (F6551A) and "Import Master Data - Business Partners (New)" (F6553A).
What i did was, i selected a Business Partner with all tables exported it as an XML and then unlocked the file in Exel so it could be edited. I then tried to just import it into another tenant without a source system, but during the creation of this Import process, the process gets stuck on the status "Importing file" . Also the file i uploaded starts to flicker, so it disappears for a second in the ui and then appears again and this goes on for ever. 

So my question is, is this error/bug specific to our system or did i miss some important step in the process of exporting and importing ?

Best regards 
Lukas

entry.title: Custom Logic S/4 Hana Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I am developing some custom logic. My goal is to have the system send a payload to a specific endpoint in our in-house system whenever a Process Order is technically completed.

The payload should contain the following:

  • Process Order: {Number}

  • Status: {Completed}

Could anyone help me with this?

Thanks and best regards,

entry.title: Duplicated invoice posting issues for ERS job
entry.content:
Dear SAP Support,

We"ve met duplicated invoice posting issues for ERS job.

Background: When we create Purchase order, post goods issue, we use ERS function, schedule supplier invoice job, to create the invoice every day. Normally, once the invoice was posted for the goods receipt document, at the next day, it won"t create the invoice again.

Problem: We have purchase order 4500004906, the goods receipt document 500000263 was reversed by 500000264 on the same day before ERS job run.

When run ERS job, it created a supplier invoice job with amount 0.

The problem is that system created the supplier invoice with amount 0 every day for the same goods receipt document 500000263 and 500000264.

Questions:

Why system can create the supplier invoice many times for the same goods receipt document (with its reversal document)?

Why ERS job can create the supplier invoice job with amount 0? (When use APP "Create supplier invoice, it cannot post the invoice with amount 0).

Temporary solution:

There are many reversal GR documents like above example, we cancelled the job, and rescheduled it, changed the goods receipt posting date from Sep.12, then the problem is solved.

Questions: How can we avoid such duplicated posting issues in future?

Thank you.

Best Regards,

Grace

entry.title: Export of CDS View generates two lines for one Product
entry.content:

This CDS View generates the following layout:

 

 

The issue here is, once we download the Export of this CDS View we receive two lines  for one material: line 1 with english description, line 2 with german description:

 

 

Can this be prevented so that we receive just one line (whether in english or in german)?

Best regards,

Kerisha

entry.title: API Call to an OAuth 2.0 Endpoint in S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello experts,

I'm trying to make an API call to an external service that uses OAuth 2.0 with a token. I have already configured the communication arrangement with the correct token URL, Client ID, and Client Secret.

However, when I execute the API call, I receive an HTTP status 401 Unauthorized. I've tested the exact same credentials and payload in Postman, and the call is successful.

Has anyone faced a similar issue when developing an API call like this in S/4HANA Public Cloud? What steps did you take to successfully handle this?

Kind Regards,

Marcelo Romeiro

entry.title: Custom depreciation key Public cloud 2% declining balance: IFRS Chart of Depreciation
entry.content:
Dear Team,

Our customer has an internal reporting requirement to calculate depreciation on certain assets using 2% & 15% declining balance method. And the customer is using IFRS as chart of depreciation.

We have filled the expert configuration template for custom depreciation keys - the expert configuration template outlines that we can only use the existing declining balance method & calculation methods within the same chart of depreciation where the custom depreciation key is being requested.

However, we cannot find any existing declining balance method in IFRS Chart of depreciation with 0.02 and 0.15 declining factor and neither there is a possibility of changing the factors of an existing declining balance method. 

Does it mean achieving the above requirement is not possible within Public Cloud? Anyone with similar requirement and how did you address to fill this gap?

Please suggest.

Regards,

Kunal

entry.title: How to avoid FX distortions in production order variances when activity price is at CO Area?
entry.content:
Hi, I understand one CO area is supported in S/4HANA Public Cloud and wish to clarify implications for activity price determination and its use in production orders in the context of a global manufacturing business:

  1. As I understand, activity prices (e.g. labour hours, machine hours) are still calculated and maintained in the controlling area currency.

  2. These activity prices are then used to value internal activity allocations on production orders.

  3. This raises a concern that production order variances (especially price variances) could be influenced by currency exchange fluctuations, even when the underlying cost inputs are local (e.g. local wage rates or machine costs).

entry.title: How to speed up depreciation for an asset's rest life
entry.content:
Hi,

I have one question about depreciation. Our company need to move to new Office, I want to speed up an asset depreciation. My question is: I want to keep the depreciation history not change, but for the rest useful life, for instance, It still has 10 months, 1000cny/Month to run depreciation, now I need to let it complete in 5 months, 2000 cny/month to run the net value to zero.

I tried to added an interval date and set the useful life to 5 period, but the weird was, the depreciation be calculated in only 1 month, not 5 months,  the net value became zero directly. what wrong with my set?

entry.title: 在阿根延，销售发票的代扣代缴税如何实现
entry.content:
我们在阿根延SAP S4 public cloud项目中，有销售发票(sale billing)想实现对客户的代收代缴。

生成的会计凭证如下：

借：应收金额  122  ARS ，

贷：收入 100  ARS，

贷：增值税 21  ARS（21%的税率），

贷：代收代缴税  1   ARS(1%的税率) 。

请问我在销售发票定价程序中，要使用哪个条件类型实现代收代缴税1%。
